ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] administrationStatus with data type Code
The latest BCMA (Bar Code Medication Administration) for this order. VALUES: I=Infusing, S=Stop, H=Held, R=Refuse, C=Completed, G=Given.
Contains zero or more [0..*] medicationAdministrationEvent, where its type is _ Medication Administration Event
